mapper.select: SELECT BLOK.CLINSPE_NO, CL.BLOODGET_DATE, CL.BLOODGET_EMP, CL.EXMNT_CD, CL.TRMT_DEPT, CL.RESP_DOCT, BLOK.CLINSPE_BLOK_CODE, BLOK.CLINSPE_BLOK_PROD_DAY, BLOK.CLINSPE_BLOK_PROD_TIME, BLOK.CLINSPE_BLOK_QNT, SLI.SLI_CODE, SLI.SLI_PROD_DAY, SLI.SLI_QNT, SLI.SLI_CON, BLOK.PAT_NO, BLOK.PAT_NM FROM SL_CLINSPE_SLI SLI INNER JOIN SL_CLINSPE CL ON CL.CLINSPE_NO = SLI.CLINSPE_NO INNER JOIN SL_CLINSPE_BLOK BLOK ON BLOK.CLINSPE_NO = SLI.CLINSPE_NO WHERE BLOK.CLINSPE_NO = #{clinspeNo} ORDER BY CLINSPE_NO, BLOODGET_DATE, EXMNT_CD, CLINSPE_BLOK_CODE, SLI_CODE
